name: 林水泉
objective: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題。
schedule:
週次	講授內容概要	課本章節
1	Introduction	Chapter 1
2		
3	Steady-State Conduction one Dimension	Chapter 2
4		
5	Steady-State Conduction Multiple Dimensions	Chapter 3
6		
7	Unsteady-state Conduction	Chapter 4
8		
9	期中考	
10	Principle of Convection	Chapter 5
11		
12	Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer	Chapter 6
13		
14	Natural Convection Systems	Chapter 7
15		
16	Radiation Heat Transfer	Chapter 8
17	Condensation and Boiling ＆ Heat Exchanges	Chapter 9、10
18	期末考
scorePolicy:
評分及考試
作業與平時出席佔30％，期中考佔30％，期末考佔40％
